[
    For {
        init: [
            AssignmentOperation(
                Assign {
                    left: Variable(
                        SimpleVariable(
                            SimpleVariable {
                                span: (
                                    3,
                                    6,
                                ),
                                name: "i",
                            },
                        ),
                    ),
                    span: (
                        3,
                        9,
                    ),
                    right: LiteralInteger {
                        span: (
                            3,
                            11,
                        ),
                        value: "0",
                    },
                },
            ),
            AssignmentOperation(
                Assign {
                    left: Variable(
                        SimpleVariable(
                            SimpleVariable {
                                span: (
                                    3,
                                    14,
                                ),
                                name: "i",
                            },
                        ),
                    ),
                    span: (
                        3,
                        17,
                    ),
                    right: LiteralInteger {
                        span: (
                            3,
                            19,
                        ),
                        value: "1",
                    },
                },
            ),
        ],
        condition: [],
        loop: [],
        then: [],
    },
]
